entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vaughan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 3:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
